alert.note: Alert for Upper Santa Cruz River and Altar Valleys including Nogales (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 2:00PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Santa Cruz County through 245 PM MST... At 200 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Nogales, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Nogales, Rio Rico, Nogales International Airport and Kino Springs. This includes the following highways... Interstate 19 between mile markers 1 and 12. Route 82 between mile markers 1 and 9. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Upper Santa Cruz River and Altar Valleys including Nogales
